attributes.action: The police in all country's to work with paedophile hunters not go against them
attributes.additional_details: The teams get all the information of what the pedophiles has said to a child they hand over all the filthy pics that the pedophiles has sent to a child whether it's a decoy in their mind they think they are talking to a real child and a lot of them do talk to real children.whose lives are destroyed  by these individuals. The evidence is 100% there's no mistaking its that person who has contacted the child everything is backed up with proof.even with some of them admitting what they done.
attributes.background: The hunters hand over 100% watertight evidence. No harm comes to the pedophile they protect them  until police arrive.they video for their safety  and the predator.also for exposure.
